item.description:
Hi All,

Update regarding Dinner afterwards, if Redbones is too busy to take us - we may venture over to the Burren. Hope that works for everyone!

Anna



Hi everyone,

I wanted to change things a bit since the seating is general admission. The plan is to meet up at Redbones for a quick beer at 6:00 pm and then head over to the Somerville Theatre at 6:30 pm. Then go back to Redbones for dinner after the show.

Please change your responses and let me know! I look forward to meeting you all!

Anna


Anna S. will be running this meetup! I forgot that i had a prior committment. Thanks Anna for helping out!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Warren Miller's Children of Winter, the largest action sports film on the planet, is back for the 59h year! Presented in High Definition, Children of Winter takes you on a global adventure to locations like Japan, Austria, Iceland, and more. Warren Miller film premiers are an experience, a celebration, and should not be missed. Reserved Seating.

If you are into winter like we are, you can't miss this show.

To attend, you must purchase your own tickets via Ticketmaster...
Purchase Tickets


You Tube Trailer

Once you've purchased a ticket(s), then please RSVP here.

Dinner, Movie, and Drinks afterwards? Check out the questions after you RSVP.
item.name: Warren Miller's Children of Winter @ Somerville Theater - Davis Square.
